articles.author: Rachel Ramirez and Drew Kann, CNN
articles.title: New York City was never built to withstand a deluge like the one Ida delivered. It showed. - CNN
articles.description: From the heatwaves in the Pacific Northwest to the damage strewn from Louisiana to the Northeast by Ida, the floods are just the latest example of how ill-prepared America is for what climate change has in store.
